ul.class: nav nav-pills flex-column mt16 collapse show filter_shop_list

div.p: Click 'New' in the top-right corner to create your first product.

t.t-value: [ (most_viewed_desc_label, 'ks_view_count desc'), (create_date_desc_label, 'create_date desc'), (highest_rating_label, 'ks_rating_avg desc'), (highest_sale_label, 'ks_sale_count desc'), (list_price_desc_label, 'list_price desc'), (list_price_asc_label, 'list_price asc'), (name_asc_label, 'name asc'), (name_desc_label, 'name desc') ]
[sort for sort in website_sale_sortable if sort[1]==request.params.get('order', '')]

li.t-attf-class: nav-item ks-filter-main #{' ks-remove-chevron' if not c.child_id else ''}

a.t-attf-class: nav-link#{' ks_active active' if c.id == int(category or 0) else ''}

ul.class: nav nav-pills flex-column nav-hierarchy ks-filter-open collapse

t.t-if: not search or c.id in search_categories_ids

template.name: Kinetik Attribute's, Brand's and Price's Filters

ul.class: list-unstyled w-100 collapse show ml-0 pl-4 filter_shop_list

label.t-attf-class: nav-link#{' ks_brand_active active' if b.id in brnd_set else ''}

input.name: brnd
input.t-att-checked: 'checked' if b.id in brnd_set else None

ul.class: nav nav-pills flex-column collapse show filter_shop_list

label.t-attf-class: nav-link#{' ks_attrib_active active' if v.id in attrib_set else ''}

input.name: attrib
input.t-att-checked: 'checked' if v.id in attrib_set else None

label.t-attf-class: css_attribute_color #{' ks_attrib_active active' if v.id in attrib_set else ''}

input.name: attrib
input.t-att-checked: 'checked' if v.id in attrib_set else None

div.class: w-100 d-flex collapse justify-content-center ks_price_slider show filter_shop_list

table.class: table table-bordered table-hover text-center mt16 table-comparator

template.name: Comparator - Product row in comparator popover
